teaser: Yet another blow for JC Penney. The company says it will close 33 stores and slash 2000 jobs. Nigeria -- the second largest economy in Africa -- plans to start up a mortgage finance company similar to Fannie Mae here in the United States. And could too much financial news impact your mental health?
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Thursday, January 16, 2014
byline: David Brancaccio, D Gorenstein, Kirk Carapezza, Mark Garrison, Chris Farrell and Nancy Marshall-Genzer
title: Marketplace Morning Report for Thursday, January 16, 2014
